reviewText:
The lovely Stacy Sanches is in all her glory here along with Playmate Donna D'Errico. It's easy to see why she got the title of Playmate of the Year. Stacy looks just gorgeous here and she shows it off playfully. She is lovely and very sweet. In her life she loves animals and goes out of her way to help them in anyway she can. If she sees any of them in a distressful situation, she stops what she is doing and gives a helping hand right on the spot. This lovely woman is truly a blessing to the women of the world. I really wish there were more like her in all that she does! I am PROUD to call her a genuine friend.

The DVD is well done and looks good for it being made in 1996. Image Entertainment did a good job with quality of picture and menu. Easy selection of chapters which include ~

1 ~ Main Titles "STACY SANCHES"
2 ~ JUST A DOWNHOME TEXAS GIRL
3 ~ A REAL FAMILY REUNION (Stacy sits down with her mother and sister, Kim, and discusses some genuine family life.)
4 ~ FEEL THE RHYTHM
5 ~ DREAMING ON A RAINY DAY
6 ~ SISTERS
7 ~ GIRLS' DAY IN (Stacy with her sister Kim, having some fun exercising and playing around.)
8 ~ KNIGHT IN SHINING SPURS
9 ~ PICTORIAL (Some still pictures of Stacy from her Playmate Profile.)
10 ~ HEAT OF THE NIGHT
11 ~ Playmate Profile : DONNA D' ERRICO (The lovely Donna shows us why she loves Las Vegas and some beautiful pictures of her as well.)
12 ~ FATE
13 ~ SUN WORSHIPPER
 Running time is 53 MINUTES TOTAL.  COL.OR, STEREO, 1996
She's gorgeous.  Not much else to say; good quality, wish it were HD but whatever.  Worth the ten bucks and change.

I used to live next door to Stacy and Kim in Dallas back in 1991-1992. When I found out Stacy had become Playmate of the Year in 96, I was ecstatic! I had to purchase this video and, while it depicted Kim and Stacy well, it doesn't do them justice.
The sides of them I didn't get to see were incredible!

Stacy is definitely gorgious and exotic.  She wears the best underwear, and her hip movements add to a very arousing video.  I strongly recommend it.  Donna D-Erico was a disappointment, but Stacy's sister, Kim, is a  knockout and more than makes up for the Baywatch beauty.
